Data:

<https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/data/experiment/vignettes/TENxPBMCData/inst/doc/TENxPBMCData.html>

```{r, echo: FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(TENxPBMCData)

data <- TENxPBMCData("pbmc3k")
seurat_object <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = data, project = "PBMC")

```

```{r}
# Install and load required packages
library(TENxPBMCData)
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(Seurat)

# Load the PBMC dataset
data <- TENxPBMCData("pbmc3k")

# Convert to Seurat object
seurat_object <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = data, project = "PBMC")
```
